title: Born in fire
creator_credit: Shepherd Baker Studios, Woodside Petroleum Ltd and Guy Baskin
brief_description: Depicts the final stages of construction, as well as the tow, launch and placement of the substructure for the first offshore production platform for the North West Shelf Project. The aim of the project is to develop a natural gas field to supply power for domestic and industrial use in Perth and southwest Western Australia. Narrated by John Waters. Suitable for secondary years 7-12.
